item.title: Tomato, Chef’s Choice Orange Hybrid
item.dc:creator: Nguyễn Minh Khoa
item.description: When it comes to a beefsteak for slicing, saucing, and soup-ing, ‘Chef’s Choice Orange’ is your best bet. Combining the perfect balance of rich, heirloom flavor and function, bright orange 9-12 oz. fruits keep their radiant tangerine tones, fresh or cooked. As adaptable in the garden as it is in the kitchen, ‘Chef’s Choice Orange’ […]
item.content:encoded: When it comes to a beefsteak for slicing, saucing, and soup-ing, ‘Chef’s Choice Orange’ is your best bet. Combining the perfect balance of rich, heirloom flavor and function, bright orange 9-12 oz. fruits keep their radiant tangerine tones, fresh or cooked. As adaptable in the garden as it is in the kitchen, ‘Chef’s Choice Orange’ more than merits the All-America Selections award for 2015. This hybrid-heirloom, adapted from the tasty but late ‘Amana Orange’ will quickly be a favorite to sink your teeth into. Each 5-6’ plant yields up two dozen fruits over the season. Disease-resistant plants resist cracking, as well. Indeterminate.

item.title: Tomato, Tye-Dye Hybrid
item.dc:creator: Nguyễn Minh Khoa
item.description: One flavor-full, color-full, beautiful tomato. This breakthrough bicolor gold and red hybrid delivers all the heirloom flavor of Big Rainbow, Pineapple and Georgia Streak-with bigger yields, consistent form and better disease-resistance. The large, smooth 7 oz. fruits, miraculously marbled with red streaks, are lusciously sweet, mild and non-acidic. (140.000đ/15seeds)
item.content:encoded:
One flavor-full, color-full, beautiful tomato. This breakthrough bicolor gold and red hybrid delivers all the heirloom flavor of Big Rainbow, Pineapple and Georgia Streak-with bigger yields, consistent form and better disease-resistance. The large, smooth 7 oz. fruits, miraculously marbled with red streaks, are lusciously sweet, mild and non-acidic.

(140.000đ/15seeds)

item.title: Tomato, Red October Hybrid
item.dc:creator: Nguyễn Minh Khoa
item.description: The first long shelf life tomato with the indeterminate plant habit that goes hand in hand with top-notch taste. Big 8 oz. red fruits can hang a long time on the vine without softening or losing flavor. Harvested fully ripe in fall, they will keep 3-4 weeks longer than other varieties, without refrigeration. Good disease […]
item.content:encoded:
The first long shelf life tomato with the indeterminate plant habit that goes hand in hand with top-notch taste. Big 8 oz. red fruits can hang a long time on the vine without softening or losing flavor. Harvested fully ripe in fall, they will keep 3-4 weeks longer than other varieties, without refrigeration. Good disease resistance.

(120.000đ/30seeds)

item.title: Tomato, San Marzano Seed
item.dc:creator: Nguyễn Minh Khoa
item.description: San Marzano tomatoes have thick and meaty flesh that is perfect for sauces or pastes. They are a great candidate for oven-drying, too. Certified Organic Seed. (140.000đ/150seeds)
item.content:encoded:
San Marzano tomatoes have thick and meaty flesh that is perfect for sauces or pastes. They are a great candidate for oven-drying, too. Certified Organic Seed.

(140.000đ/150seeds)
